760.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check whether an array of numbers contains only one distinct element or not.

600.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check whether the given number is even or not.

267.task_description: Write a method in Dafny that takes in an integer n and returns the sum of the squares of the first n odd natural numbers.
